title: need FPS help
body:
hi guys
i have a big FPS problem on my laptop (20-25 FPS ) with a decent graphic (GT 540M) card that should get atleast 80 FPS in medium according to Youtube graphic card tests. Lowering settings didnt work . Is there any type of solution other than buying a new pc?
I legit changed my championpool because of this (focused more on champs that is not needed on the teamfights, like Nasus.)

Any answer is appreciated

replies.body: Are you using windows 10? Have you tried disabling the xbox app because everytime you play (anygames), that automatically opens.

If you're having drops in FPS on a laptop, it could be traced to your laptop's power settings. Let's try going through our [FPS Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)) to see if we can narrow down the issue. Be sure to go through each step, since low fps could be caused by any one of them.

Let me know how this works out for you!

Hey Riot Broporo, First of all thank you for your answers.
And i did check ALL the steps and it unfortunataly did not work.
EDIT: I forgot to write something, sometimes the FPS goes full 60 FPS if im lucky but after hours it goes down to 20 fps which is unplayable. My PC doesnt have heating problems since i keep it cool all the time.

It sounds like we may need to look into your case individually. Let's use our Hextech Repair Tool, which will generate some logs that provide more detail about what's going on. Attach those logs to a ticket, and our tech team will be able to better assist you.

Let me know if you have any questions about the Repair Tool!
